story: Robert Baratheon was Lord for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a ruler. Robert Baratheon was having an happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened  the peace of Robert Baratheon . Initially Robert Baratheon was afraid, but with the help of Rhaella Targaryen got stronger and learnt slowing Time. In Great Sept of Baelor at the Winter Solstice ,Robert Baratheon met Gendry and they formed an alliance. At Night, Robert Baratheon and Gendry were almost in Great Sept of Baelor when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Robert Baratheon used slowing Time forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Robert Baratheon managed to save the beloved the treasure. In Red Keep celebrated with  Gendry by watching a play .

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a mass murderer. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the jewel of Arya Stark. Initially Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of Arya Stark got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. In Great Sept of Baelor at Night ,Arya Stark met Bran Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark with the help of Bran Stark finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Riverlands. A bloody battle begun but Arya Stark thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. Eventually the freedom was safe again. Arya Stark and Bran Stark went to The Vale of Arryn and celebrated by playing a game.

story: A long time ago Robert Baratheon, Lord from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a a military leader. The evil Cersei Lannister one day posed a threat to the freedom of Robert Baratheon. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Tyrion Lannister, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of fire sorcery. On the way to The Whispering Wood at the Autumnal Equinox, Robert Baratheon met Cassana Baratheon and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Robert Baratheon with the help of Cassana Baratheon finally found Cersei Lannister in Oldstones. A bloody battle begun but Robert Baratheon thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Cersei Lannister. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Cassana Baratheon went to Oldstones and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.
